attributes.additional_details: People that suffer from this rare debilitating disease have to pay for medications. This life threatening condition. and medications costs hundreds of pounds per year. Without the medications they will cost the Health Service more money when hospitalized. These medications can help with a good, or acceptable quality of life. Why should they have to pay for them? Please let them have free prescriptions, its the right thing to do. There are not many people in the Country that suffer.
